form.label: Asset Services & Ports
form.description: This dashboard shows details about Services and Applications that might be exposed on ports for Assets in the environment

search.query: `gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype` | stats count by dest | fields - count | sort dest
`gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype` | stats count by result.port | rename result.port as port | fields - count | sort port

viz.title: Note: You can use your mouse to pan/zoom the visualization.

search.query: `gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype` dest=TERM($tokAsset$) result.port=TERM($tokPort$) signature=*banner* OR signature=*detection* OR result.nvt{@oid} = TERM(`http_server_type_version_nvt_oid`) OR result.nvt{@oid} = TERM(`service_detection_nvt_oid`) AND (result.nvt{@oid} != TERM(`http_security_headers_nvt_oid`) result.nvt{@oid} != TERM(`deprecated_tls_protocol_nvt_oid`) result.nvt{@oid} != TERM(`icmp_timestamp_detection_nvt_oid`)) | stats count by signature, dest, result.port | appendpipe [stats count by dest result.port | rename dest as source, result.port as target | sort target] | appendpipe [stats count by result.port signature | rename result.port as source, signature as target | sort source] | search source=* | fields source target count

`gvm_index` `gvm_sourcetype` dest=TERM($tokAsset$) result.port=TERM($tokPort$) signature=*banner* OR signature=*detection* OR result.nvt{@oid} = TERM(`http_server_type_version_nvt_oid`) OR result.nvt{@oid} = TERM(`service_detection_nvt_oid`) AND (result.nvt{@oid} != TERM(`http_security_headers_nvt_oid`) result.nvt{@oid} != TERM(`deprecated_tls_protocol_nvt_oid`) result.nvt{@oid} != TERM(`icmp_timestamp_detection_nvt_oid`)) | rex mode=sed field=result.description "s/\s{2,}|\s*\|\s+Enumeration technique\s+\-+\s+/ /g" | stats values(dest) as Asset values(result.description) as Details by dest_ip, result.port | rename dest_ip as "IP Address", result.port as "Service Port" | table Asset, "IP Address", "Service Port", Details | sort "IP Address", "Service Port"
